objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><defs><linearGradient id='bg1' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='100%' y2='100%'><stop offset='0%' style='stop-color:#1A4B7C'/><stop offset='49%' style='stop-color:#1A4B7C'/><stop offset='51%' style='stop-color:#E8F4FF'/><stop offset='100%' style='stop-color:#E8F4FF'/></linearGradient></defs><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#bg1)'/><path d='M0 0 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='#3A6BA0' opacity='0.1'/><path d='M1080 1080 L1080 0 L0 1080 Z' fill='#C5E1FF' opacity='0.1'/><circle cx='200' cy='200' r='100' fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.05'/><circle cx='880' cy='880' r='150' fill='#1A4B7C' opacity='0.05'/><g fill='#FFFFFF' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='180' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='220' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='260' cy='100' r='3'/><circle cx='180' cy='140' r='3'/><circle cx='220' cy='140' r='3'/><circle cx='260' cy='140' r='3'/><circle cx='180' cy='180' r='3'/><circle cx='220' cy='180' r='3'/><circle cx='260' cy='180' r='3'/></g><g fill='#1A4B7C' opacity='0.1'><circle cx='820' cy='900' r='3'/><circle cx='860' cy='900' r='3'/><circle cx='900' cy='900' r='3'/><circle cx='820' cy='940' r='3'/><circle cx='860' cy='940' r='3'/><circle cx='900' cy='940' r='3'/><circle cx='820' cy='980' r='3'/><circle cx='860' cy='980' r='3'/><circle cx='900' cy='980' r='3'/></g></svg>

objects.text:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Sourced Milk
• No artificial additives
• Rich in nutrients & calcium
• From local farms to your table

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Premium Dairy Collection - Pure & Wholesome Milk
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Fresh Farm-Sourced Milk
• No artificial additives or preservatives
• Rich in essential nutrients and calcium
• Available in various container sizes for convenience
• Perfect for cooking, baking, and direct consumption
• Pasteurized for safety while maintaining natural taste
• Carefully handled and bottled to ensure maximum freshness
• Ideal source of protein and vitamins
• Recyclable glass packaging - eco-friendly choice
• Direct from local dairy farms to your table

banner_details:
This visually compelling banner features a gradient diagonal background shifting from a rich navy blue (#1A4B7C) to a soft sky blue (#E8F4FF), intersected by abstract shapes and subtle circular textures, giving the layout a modern and dynamic appeal. On the left side of the banner, bold, all-caps text layers — identified as `heading`, `subheading`, and `product_title` — convey urgency and introduce the product. Supporting text such as `description`, `tagline`, and `urgency_text` details the benefits and limited-time nature of the offer. The `price` layer is prominently displayed in large font for emphasis. A high-quality image of glass milk containers is placed on the right (`product_image`), enhancing visual interest. Finally, a strong call-to-action (`cta_button` and `cta`) — a white button with contrasting blue text — encourages immediate engagement.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: #1A4B7C  
- Sky Blue: #E8F4FF  
- Soft Blue Accent: #C5E1FF  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Light Blue Overlay: #3A6BA0
product_color: The product image showcases a clean and fresh composition of milk in clear glass containers, highlighting purity and health. The dominant color palette is soft white (#FDFDFD) for the milk, cool blue (#A4D3F4) seen in the handle and necks of the bottles, and subtle glass grayish tones (#D3D3D3) that emphasize transparency and cleanliness. The blue gently blends into the clear glass, providing a refreshing aura while still making the white milk stand out. The interplay of white and blue accentuates cleanliness and freshness, ideal for an advertisement banner focused on health, purity, and trust.
